primary_trope.name: countdown
primary_trope.hook_text: Where Rose City Rampage Gravel Race breaks you

beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Rose City Rampage Gravel Race breaks you. 55 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.text_on_screen: Rose City Rampage Gravel Race — Where It Hurts
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone

broll_sources.query: Rose City Rampage Gravel Race route map
Rose City Rampage Gravel Race course walkthrough

beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 18
beats.narration: Mile 18. Early Plains. First plains sections.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: Rose City Rampage Gravel Race course preview

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 1 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 27
beats.narration: Mile 27. Midpoint. Halfway through the course.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: Rose City Rampage Gravel Race course preview

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 45
beats.narration: Mile 45. Late Plains. Final plains sections before finish.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: Rose City Rampage Gravel Race course preview

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 3 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: CTA + LOOP
beats.narration: Full suffering breakdown on the site. Link in bio.
beats.visual: Full map with all zones lit up
beats.editing_note: Loop design: end with zoomed-out map that connects back to the opening frame.
beats.engagement_question: Which zone would end your race? Comment the mile marker.

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style cartoon cyclist in agony, route map background, red zone markers, 'Rose City Rampage Gravel Race' text --ar 9:16 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.tiktok: Post natively. Design for loop replay. Trending audio optional.
cross_platform_notes.instagram_reels: Same cut. Add location tag for race area.
cross_platform_notes.youtube_shorts: Same cut. Pin comment with link to full breakdown.
cross_platform_notes.twitter_x: Post thumbnail still + hot take as tweet text.

production_checklist: [ ] B-roll sourced (check broll_sources in each beat)
[ ] Music track selected (check BPM targets per beat)
[ ] Loop point tested (final frame → opening frame)
[ ] Test 3-second hold rate with fresh eyes
